title: Enchanting Mayura Jhumkis: A Symphony of Sparkle and Grace
materials: Crafted in gleaming 18K white and rose gold. Adorned with dazzling brilliant-cut diamonds and delicate pink tourmalines. Features our signature Hyderabadi polish for an unparalleled luster.
features: These exquisite jhumkis feature a stylized peacock (Mayura) design, a symbol of beauty and prosperity. The peacock's crest is rendered in rose gold, while the plumage is meticulously set with pav√© diamonds, creating a mesmerizing sparkle. The earrings dangle with a cascade of beautifully bezel-set pink tourmalines.
colors: and soft pink tourmalines create a harmonious and elegant color palette.
occasions: grand festivals like Diwali or Dussehra
description: Experience the allure of contemporary design infused with traditional South Indian motifs. These Mayura Jhumkis boast impeccable craftsmanship, ethically sourced gemstones, and enduring value. The peacock design symbolizes grace, beauty, and good fortune, making them an unforgettable gift or a cherished addition to your personal collection.
